description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply and delivery of UAS Equipment, training and support. This procurement process is intended to result in the acquisition of UAS Equipment, training, and support with an option to acquire additional resources made available to National Defence for a period of up to sixteen (16) months after contract award. The equipment, training, and support, being bid in this requirement must fully comply with the Technical Specifications within the Request for Proposal solicitation document.If other bidders are interested in submitting a proposal they will have to qualify for Supply Arrangement before they are given an opportunity to bid on this requirement. To obtain a copy of the Request for Supply Arrangement W3048-21KJ89 contact Herb Choquette,","   "Herb.Choquette@PWGSC.gc.ca.'/THE TENDER CLOSING DATE IS:   2023-02-15/,"END OF BENEFIT EXISTS:
